summary: Takes place in the 80's where a group of teenagers go to visit an abandoned hotel, only to find themselves hunted by a psychotic killer through the Norwegian woods.
cast: Ida Marie Bakkerud|Julie Rusti|Kim S. Falck-Jørgensen|Pål Stokka|Arthur Berning|Sturla Rui|Terje Ranes|Nils Johnson|Endre Hellestveit|Dennis Nilsen Nystrøm|Hallvard Holmen|Trine Wiggen
keywords: murder of parents|broken down car|hiking|rural setting|abandoned building
title: Fritt vilt III
